full_summary:
# Project Coordinator Level 2 (NRC-CNRC) - Request for Proposal (RFP)

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of project coordination services. This tender is for the hiring of one (1) project coordinator, level 2, for a period of approximately 12 months.

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01028060
* **Solicitation Number**: 22-58123
* **Publication Date**: March 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 16, 2023, at 14:00 (EDT)
* **Contracting Entity**: National Research Council Canada
* **Contact Information**: Philippe Cléroux, philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca

## Tender Description

The successful bidder will be responsible for providing level 2 project coordination services to the NRC, which may involve managing multiple projects simultaneously. The estimated quantity of commodity for this tender is N/A, and the duration of the contract is approximately 12 months. The time frame of delivery is from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024.

## Invitation to Tender

This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) that seeks proposals from suitable vendors who can provide level 2 project coordination services. The RFP document, including the technical specifications and evaluation criteria, is available on the Canada Buys website.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Regions of Opportunity

The tender is open to all qualified vendors, and the contract will be awarded to the successful bidder based on the evaluation criteria outlined in the RFP document.
